title: Can't download league
body: So everytime i try to download league it will stop at 33% and then move on to to about 46% and then say error has occured check the logs. help me please this is so annoying.

replies.body:
At 33%, the patcher is attempting to download files from the patching servers, so issues here are often caused by an unstable connection to those servers. Most of the time this is the result of incompatible network settings that prevent a good link from happening, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
